plugin.name: xBroadcast_Runto
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.description:
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]
Detects when there is a change in state
Example:
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if id == "aaa7b6edb20fa44565c5a327" then if msg == 1 then -- runto started elseif msg == 2 then -- done with runto end end -- playing status changed end
require swalec's Aardwolf_exits_detector

muclient.script:
require "var" require "pluginhelper" require "verify" require 'ldplugin'
runto = false seenrecall = false oneexit = false current_room = ''
function runstart(name, line, wildcards) runto = true seenrecall = false enabletriggroup("runtostuff", true) broadcast(1) end
function runend(name, line, wildcards) if seenrecall and not oneexit then oneexit = true return end if runto and seenrecall then enabletriggroup("runtostuff", false) runto = false seenrecall = false oneexit = false broadcast(2) end end
